actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production, Marketing, and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend section 8c of the Agricultural Adjustment Act, as reenacted and amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to promote the consumption of mushrooms through the issuance of marketing orders under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act, as reenacted and amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to provide for marketing orders applicable to mushrooms.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8c of the Agricultural Adjustment Act, as reenacted and amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to promote the consumption of mushrooms through the issuance of marketing orders under such Act.
